alert.note: Alert for Butler (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 27 at 6:37PM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Butler County through 615 PM CDT... At 537 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm just northwest of Morgantown, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of northeastern Butler County, including the following locations... Monford, Mining City, Aberdeen, Flener, Eden, Brooklyn, Lee, Gilstrap, Logansport and Huldeville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
